participant_1.background:
I have two cats and a dog.
I own my own very successful dieting business.
I also write diet cookbooks.
I enjoy exercising for long hours.

participant_2.background:
I am an eccentric hair stylist for dogs.
I have been married four times and widowed three.
I fake a british accent to seem more attractive.
My favorite past time is collecting civil war antiques.
I have an allergy to mangoes.

content.text: Hello, I'm (name), it's nice to meet you!
Hello, I'm (name), it's nice to meet you too!
What do you do for a living?
I'm an eccentric hair stylist for dogs.
That's interesting! What do you like most about your job?
I love getting to work with dogs all day. They're such happy creatures, and it's always fun to see them get all dressed up.
I can imagine! I love dogs too. Do you have any pets of your own?
Yes, I have two cats and a dog. I love taking them to the park and playing with them in the backyard.
That sounds great! Do you have any hobbies?
I love to collect civil war antiques. I find it fascinating to learn about the history of our country.
That's really cool! I love history too. What's your favorite piece of civil war memorabilia?
My favorite piece is a musket that was used by a soldier in the Union Army. It's really well-preserved, and I love to hold it and imagine what it was like to fight in the civil war.
That sounds amazing! I'd love to see it sometime.
I'd be happy to show it to you!
Great! I'll let you know when I'm free.
